name: T2shuffling Demonstration Code
tagline: Demonstration code for the MRM manuscript, "T2 Shuffling: Sharp, Multi-Contrast, Volumetric Fast Spin-Echo Imaging"
body:
# T2 Shuffling Supporting Information
This webpage contains supporting information for the manuscript,  
J.I. Tamir, M. Uecker, W. Chen, P. Lai, M.T. Alley, S.S. Vasanawala, and M. Lustig, [T2 Shuffling: Sharp, multicontrast, volumetric fast spin-echo imaging][t2shuffling-paper]. *Magn Reson Med* 2016 (Early View). doi: 10.1002/mrm.26102

All the demos and code to reproduce the figures can be found on the [GitHub repository][github]. The repository contains a reference implementation of T2 Shuffling as well as in vivo data from a volunteer scan (collected with IRB approval).

A copy of the supporting information can be downloaded from here:  
[t2shuffling_support.pdf][t2shuffling_support] (Sha-1: `d06cb9598fbad657e2e34e8daeb2a7f7540caf08`)

[t2shuffling-paper]:http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1002/mrm.26102/abstract
[github]:https://github.com/jtamir/t2shuffling-support
[t2shuffling_support]:http://www.eecs.berkeley.edu/~jtamir/t2shuffling_support.pdf
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
